reviewText: As a "monster kid" growing up in the very late 1950's/early 60's I found this video to be not only entertaining, but very informative as well in reference to how the Monster Bash Conventions that are held every year originated. I still have yet to attend one of these conventions but after watching this, it has strengthened my curiosity even more to want to. Even the cover art of the casing itself is reminiscent of the original, classic Famous Monsters Of Filmland magazine which I remember reading on a regular basis
